property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a player succeeds at this conspiracy, he may place a success token at another story at which no characters are committed

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Play a character card with cost 3 or lower from your hand. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during the story phase after you have committed characters to stories. Action: Change any number of $ icons on characters you control into icons of a single type (your choice) until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character and name a subtype on an opponent's card. Until the end of the phase that character gains that subtype, Invulnerability, and Willpower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Play during your operations phase.
Action: Choose a character without a [Terror] icon. The controller of that character must either sacrifice that character or give you control of it until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of a character card just triggered. Then, drive that character insane, if able.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is exhausted, choose a card in your hand and add it to a domain that has only ^ resources attached. Then, return a card from the same domain to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drain a domain you control with the most resources to choose a support card or a non-Ancient One character an opponent controls. That card's owner attaches it to a domain of his choice as a resource.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character you control and a character an opponent controls. Those characters trade struggle icons until the end of the phase. Then draw a card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a non-Ancient One character. That card cannot be readied or exhausted until the beginning of your next turn. (Limit 1 per turn.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of an event card that targets a character you control. The owner of that event refreshes the domain used to play that event.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a Student or Faculty character you control. That character gains Willpower, Invulnerability, and does not exhaust to commit to stories until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Play during your operations phase.
Action: Exhaust a non-Ancient One character, then put this card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Each player removes all resources attached to their domains, then attaches them one at a time to the domain he controls with the fewest resources attached. (If multiple domains are tied for the fewest, all are a legal choice.). Then gain a domain and attach Reallocate to it as a resource.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Each player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a character. Then each player that revealed a character with the lowest skill exhausts all characters he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Play only after both players have committed to stories.
Action: Each player chooses and sacrifices a character committed to each story where both players have characters committed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust City Map to search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Tactic event card and add it to your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a character.
Attached character gets –1 skill for every success token on Concrete and Chains. Forced Response: At the beginning of each turn put a success token on Concrete and Chains. If attached character has 0 skill, destroy it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control is destroyed, draw a card. Limit once per phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If you control only } cards, House Advantage is immune to your opponent's card effects.
Disrupt: Before you would draw a card, look at the top card of your deck. You may instead draw a card from the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a non-Ancient One character.
Attached character gains, "Forced Response: After your resource phase ends, pay 2 or sacrifice this character."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of each opponent's turn, ready a Criminal character you control. If it is Day ready all Criminal characters you control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a } character you control.
Disrupt: After you win a struggle at a story where attached character is committed, discard Length of Pipe to wound a character at that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a Criminal character you control.
Response: When the attached character is destroyed, destroy a character controlled by an opponent with skill is equal to or lower than the attached character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of your operations phase, exhaust The Clover Club to give each of your opponent's characters –1 skill until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a story card.
Night. It is Night. Destroy all Day cards in play.
Your } characters can commit to this story while exhausted.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may choose not to ready Sarnath during the refresh phase . Response: After a character is readied, exhaust Sarnath and pay 2 to exhaust that character. While Sarnath is exhausted that character may not be readied.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While it is Night Cat Burglar gains "Response: After you succeed at a story where Cat Burglar was committed, search the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck for a support card and put it into play under your control. Shuffle the remaining cards back into their owner's deck."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story where Clover Club High Roller is committed, wound Clover Club High Roller to add a success token to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each Criminal character you control gains Willpower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When an opponent wins a struggle at a story where Clover Club Ringer is committed, you also win that struggle. (The active player resolves their struggle first.) Limit once per turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Day. It is Day. Destroy all Night cards.
Each Criminal character you control gains [Arcane] and +1 skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a struggle at a story would resolve, sacrifice Fall Guy to cancel the results of each struggle you would lose at that story until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: When you ready Henry Knoll, choose a character. Until the end of the turn. that character gets –1 skill and gains the text "If this character has 0 skill it is destroyed."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a character card would be put into a discard pile, put it on the bottom of its owner's deck instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Forced Response: When you succeed at a story at which Jacob Finnegan is commited, add an additional success token to that story.
Forced Response: When you do not succeed at a story where Jacob Finnegan is committed, put him on the bottom of his owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets –1 skill and loses an icon of your choice, and Lena Di Boerio gets +1 skill and gains the chosen icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Marine Salvager and pay X to choose a support card in any player's discard pile. Then, put that support card into play under your control. X is equal to the printed cost of the support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. Characters your opponent controls with the same cost as the top card of your deck cannot commit to the same story as Martin Herring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you succeed at a story where Melisande Lebeau is commited, choose and destroy a support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Ready Naomi O'Bannion to choose and trigger a Tactic event card in any discard pile. Then, put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: When you ready Numbers Runner, choose and exhaust a character with lower skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: O'Bannion's Inner Council gains +1 skill for each Criminal character you control . Characters with lower skill than O'Bannion's Inner Council committed to the same story do not count their icons at that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Before a # struggle resolves at a story where you have at least one character committed, you may play Tommy Malloy from your hand committed to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Before a struggle at a story would resolve, choose a character you control committed to the same story as Wheelman. Commit Wheelman and that character to any other story where characters are committed. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: When Bill Strauss commits to a story, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a character add it to your hand; otherwise discard it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Elijah Conrad enters play, put a Location support card into play from either your discard pile or your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: During your operations phase drive Jeff Harson insane to look at your opponent's hand. Then you may choose and play an event card from his hand, ignoring all costs

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When Josef Meiger leaves play, destroy all Artifact and Ritual support cards you control.
Response: When Josef Meiger commits to a story, search your deck for an Artifact or Ritual support card and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each Government and Investigator character committed to the same story as Robert Friendly loses all % icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story where Sebastion Blake is committed, put any one card from your discard pile on the top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If Special Agent Callahan is committed to the same story where an opponent has a Criminal character committed, he gains #% and Fast.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a character would leave play, exhaust Wandering Tinker to choose a non-Relic support card attached to that character. Take control of that attachment and move it to another character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: After you win a # struggle at a story Zstylzhemgni is committed to, wound all other characters at that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Hatchet Man commits to a story, choose a struggle at that story. Count the total skill of all participating characters instead of the icons to determine the winner of that struggle.
